participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and friendly, enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: I enjoy video games but I wish I were closer to my family. My mother works at a bank. I am a fruitarian. The weather is perfect for cheering! I will be entertained while I wait for my DM to arrive.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Supportive and passionate, values family and friendships while pursuing personal interests.
participant_2.background: I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them. I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move. I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game. I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I love swimming. I'm a competitive swimmer and it's a big part of my life.
That's awesome! I wish I could swim. I'm a fruitarian and I don't eat meat.
That's interesting! I've never met a fruitarian before.
My mom works at a bank, but I wish I was closer to my family. I'm waiting for my DM to arrive and I'm getting bored. What do you do to pass the time?
I play a lot of video games and I have a beta fish that I take care of. I also like to read and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like video games too, but I don't have any pets.
I love my beta fish. His name is Bubbles.
That's a cute name! Do you have any other pets?
No, just Bubbles. I'm not really a pet person.
I'm the opposite. I love animals and I wish I could have more pets.
Well, you can always come over and visit Bubbles
